sentences.sContent: Despite my qualms, I took the job.
sentences.sCn: 尽管有些疑虑，我还是接受了那份工作。

sentences.sContent: The manager has no qualms about dropping players who do not perform well.
sentences.sCn: 对于放弃那些表现不好的队员，主教练并无不安。

trans.tranOther: a feeling of slight worry or doubt because you are not sure that what you are doing is right
